Name: A. J.
Ingredients: 50 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Garnish with a dusting of cinnamon powder.
History: The initials in the name stand for 'applejack', the American style of apple brandy this drink was originally based upon.
Nutrition: One serving of A. J. contains 176 calories
